name: Turning Point USA
description: Youth-focused conservative group promoting free markets and limited government.
platform: Promotes capitalism, constitutional values, and campus activism.

name: Heritage Action for America
description: Advocacy arm of The Heritage Foundation, focused on conservative policy.
platform: Advocates for limited government, free enterprise, and traditional values.

name: Young America's Foundation
description: Conservative youth outreach and speaker network.
platform: Hosts conferences, speakers, and campus activism for conservative students.

name: Tea Party Patriots
description: Grassroots conservative group focused on fiscal responsibility and constitutional government.
platform: Focuses on limited government, free markets, and personal liberty.

name: Moms for Liberty
description: Conservative parental rights group focused on education and local governance.
platform: Focuses on school board accountability, curriculum transparency, and civic engagement.

name: Federalist Society
description: Legal network shaping conservative jurisprudence.
platform: Promotes originalism and conservative legal principles.

name: Club for Growth
description: Fiscal conservative PAC focused on tax cuts and deregulation.
platform: Supports candidates who back limited government and low taxes.

name: FreedomWorks
description: Grassroots libertarian-leaning group born from the Tea Party wave.
platform: Advocates for lower taxes, less government, and more freedom.

name: American Conservative Union
description: Hosts CPAC and promotes conservative policies.
platform: Supports conservative candidates and policies nationwide.

name: Eagle Forum
description: Longstanding socially conservative advocacy group.
platform: Advocates for traditional family values and conservative social policy.

name: Susan B. Anthony Pro-Life America
description: Anti-abortion advocacy and candidate support.
platform: Supports pro-life legislation and candidates.

name: National Rifle Association
description: Gun rights advocacy organization.
platform: Defends Second Amendment rights and firearm ownership.

name: Gun Owners of America
description: Gun rights advocacy group.
platform: Promotes uncompromising defense of gun rights.

name: Indivisible
description: National progressive network focused on grassroots organizing and electoral reform.
platform: Supports progressive candidates, voting rights, and structural reform.

name: MoveOn
description: Progressive advocacy group mobilizing voters and promoting social justice.
platform: Focuses on healthcare, climate, democracy reform, and economic equity.

name: Sunrise Movement
description: Youth-led climate justice group with electoral and policy campaigns.
platform: Supports Green New Deal, climate action, and electoral organizing.

name: Justice Democrats
description: Progressive PAC recruiting and supporting left-wing candidates.
platform: Supports candidates who reject corporate PAC money and champion progressive policies.

name: Our Revolution
description: Bernie Sanders–aligned group focused on progressive policy and candidate support.
platform: Advocates for Medicare for All, climate justice, and democratic reform.

name: Working Families Party
description: Progressive political party and movement focused on economic and racial justice.
platform: Supports labor rights, affordable housing, and progressive candidates.

name: Unity Rising USA
description: Student-led PAC aiming to reorient Democrats toward working-class issues.
platform: Focuses on economic populism, youth organizing, and progressive realignment.

name: Democratic Socialists of America
description: Largest socialist organization in the U.S., with campus chapters.
platform: Advocates for democratic socialism, labor rights, and social justice.

name: Young Democratic Socialists of America
description: Youth wing of the Democratic Socialists of America.
platform: Organizes students and young people for democratic socialism.

name: March for Our Lives
description: Youth-led gun violence prevention movement.
platform: Advocates for stronger gun laws and safer communities.

name: Fridays for Future USA
description: Youth climate strike network inspired by Greta Thunberg.
platform: Organizes climate strikes and campaigns for climate justice.

name: NextGen America
description: Youth voter mobilization around climate and equity.
platform: Mobilizes young voters on progressive issues like climate and student debt.

name: Center for Popular Democracy
description: Progressive grassroots organizing hub.
platform: Supports community-based campaigns for racial justice, economic equity, and democracy reform.

name: People’s Action
description: National network of community-based progressive groups.
platform: Organizes around healthcare, housing, climate, and racial justice.

name: Color of Change
description: Racial justice advocacy organization.
platform: Focuses on racial equity, criminal justice reform, and corporate accountability.

name: Planned Parenthood Action Fund
description: Political advocacy arm of Planned Parenthood.
platform: Supports reproductive rights, healthcare access, and pro-choice candidates.

name: NARAL Pro-Choice America
description: Reproductive rights advocacy group.
platform: Advocates for reproductive freedom and abortion access.

name: National Organization for Women
description: Feminist advocacy network.
platform: Promotes women’s rights, gender equality, and social justice.

name: No Labels
description: Bipartisan group promoting centrist policies and cross-party cooperation.
platform: Focuses on unity, pragmatic problem-solving, and political reform.

name: BridgeUSA
description: Youth-led organization promoting political dialogue across ideological lines.
platform: Fosters civil discourse and depolarization through campus chapters and events.

name: Forward Party
description: Centrist political movement focused on electoral reform and pragmatic governance.
platform: Supports ranked-choice voting, open primaries, and data-driven policy.

name: RepresentUs
description: Anti-corruption and pro-democracy reform movement.
platform: Advocates for campaign finance reform, anti-gerrymandering, and transparency.

name: League of Women Voters
description: Nonpartisan civic engagement and voter education group.
platform: Promotes voter registration, education, and fair elections.

name: Libertarian Party
description: National party advocating for minimal government, personal liberty, and free markets.
platform: Supports deregulation, non-interventionism, and civil liberties.

name: Students For Liberty
description: International libertarian student network promoting free speech and economic freedom.
platform: Empowers student leaders to advance liberty on campus and beyond.

name: Liberty Hangout
description: Youth-oriented libertarian group with strong constitutionalist messaging.
platform: Promotes libertarian values, gun rights, and anti-authoritarianism.

name: Young Americans for Liberty
description: Campus-based libertarian student network.
platform: Organizes students for liberty, free markets, and limited government.

name: Green Party of the United States
description: National political party focused on environmentalism, social justice, and grassroots democracy.
platform: Supports ecological sustainability, nonviolence, and democratic reform.

name: Young Ecosocialists
description: Youth caucus of the Green Party, focused on climate justice and anti-capitalist organizing.
platform: Advocates for ecosocialism, anti-imperialism, and youth-led climate action.

name: 350.org
description: Global climate action network.
platform: Campaigns to end fossil fuels and promote renewable energy.

name: Sierra Club
description: Environmental advocacy and political action group.
platform: Supports clean energy, conservation, and climate action.

name: Common Cause
description: Nonpartisan watchdog group focused on government accountability and voting rights.
platform: Supports voting access, campaign finance reform, and democratic transparency.

name: American Civil Liberties Union
description: Civil liberties advocacy organization.
platform: Defends constitutional rights and civil liberties.

name: Human Rights Campaign
description: LGBTQ+ rights advocacy group.
platform: Advocates for LGBTQ+ equality and anti-discrimination policies.

name: Giffords
description: Gun violence prevention organization led by Gabby Giffords.
platform: Advocates for stronger gun laws and community safety.

name: United We Dream
description: Immigrant youth-led advocacy group.
platform: Supports immigrant rights, DACA, and humane immigration reform.
